title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM, chat or embedding backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around Ollama with readline, syntax highlighting and prompt history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI pair-programming via Ollama into the editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting synchronous, asynchronous and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; same generate/chat/embed API as other SDKs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, fine-tuning and edge deployment.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Open-WebUI, LibreChat, etc.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin for summarizing blocks, brainstorming and Q&A using Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package distributing the JavaScript SDK for Node and browsers.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for the Python SDK maintained by the Ollama team.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation with Ollama, Chroma and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chatting to any server via Ollama.
